alt: People walk in front of Cinderella's Castle.
article_heading: Disney World stampede caused by false active shooter claims, sheriff says
description: The image depicts a bustling scene at the iconic Cinderella Castle, a famous landmark located at the Walt Disney World Resort in Florida. The castle, with its distinctive blue and gold turrets, stands majestically in the background, serving as a backdrop to the lively activity in the foreground.  In the foreground, a group of people are seen walking towards the castle. They are dressed in a variety of casual and colorful clothing, with some carrying bags and backpacks, suggesting they are tourists enjoying a day at the park. The people are spread out, with some closer to the camera and others further away, creating a sense of depth in the image.  The sky above is a clear blue, indicating a sunny day, which is typical for the location. The overall atmosphere is one of excitement and enjoyment, characteristic of a day spent at a theme park. The image captures the essence of a typical day at Walt Disney World, with visitors of all ages coming together to experience the magic of the beloved fairy tale.
